title: Billy Connolly
summary: Sir William Connolly CBE (born 24 November 1942) is a Scottish actor, artist, retired comedian, musician and presenter. He is sometimes known, especially in his homeland, by the Scots nickname the Big Yin ("the Big One").[1] Known for his idiosyncratic and often improvised observational comedy, frequently including strong language, Connolly has topped many UK polls as one of the greatest comedians of all time.[2][3][4][5]
